name: Napped
description:
Napped - Atmospheric Pixel Horror game with a dark storyline set place in a small town occupied by a criminal organisation that is in charge of human trafficing. .Explore in first person the environment of a abandoned factory.The story of your carrier is going to be a personal one

Can you find the way out and save hundred of human lifes.

-Explore a secret factory
-FPS
-Retro pixel look
-Atmopspheric environment
-Resolve puzzle
-Inventory system
-Use objects to make your way out
-Intense story
